Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Armitage/Lavergne
ShortDescription: EB 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
